long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Vantage Consulting 'forgetmenot' widget supporting Katharine House Hospice. When you shop online, create a donation at no cost to you.

The ‘forgetmenot’ lets you know when you could create a donation – if you are on google, any results that could create a donation for you will be highlighted, or, if you go directly to an online shop that is a partner, a drop down message will appear at the top of the screen, letting you know a donation can be created.

This is a handy tool, which helps you remember to create those all important donations.
